description: Episode VIII - Tamas Eszterhazy - Cool down with a red-hotsolo from chiseled newcomer Tamas Esterhazy. This guy is pureperfection from top to bottom. We found him hanging out in EasternEurope and we flew him to San Francisco to shoot several scenes forus. He is Raging Stallion thru and thru, and may very well be ourhottest new discovery for 2006. You get to see him full frontal. Andtrust us, this is great stuff - solo videography taken to a new level oferotic artistry!
title: Manifesto, Scene #08
